abstract: New York City FC defeats Scottish soccer club St Mirren, 2-0, in friendly match.
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C. won the first official match in its history as Coach Jason Kreis once again made clear that he intended to construct the team in the mold of Manchester City.

headline.main: N.Y.C.F.C. Offers Clearer Glimpse of Its Plan in an Opening Victory
headline.content_kicker: New York City F.C. 2, St. Mirren 0 (Exhibition)
headline.print_headline: New York City F.C. Offers Clearer Glimpse of Its Plan in an Opening Win
